extracted_playbook.title: Apply Citrix ADM Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patches provided by Citrix to mitigate the vulnerability in Citrix ADM versions 13.0 before 13.0-85.19 and 13.1 before 13.1-21.53.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Segment network traffic to the Citrix ADMâ€™s IP address, either physically or logically, from standard network traffic as a mitigation measure.
